An English Flower Farm growing and selling beautiful seasonal flowers, located in the Alde Valley, close to the Suffolk Heritage Coast.

More.
Next

How to Buy

Our flowers can be bought at these locations –

  • Lady Whincups, Rendham, Suffolk, IP17 2AE
  • Juniper Barn Village Shop, Rendham, IP17 2AZ
  • Woodbridge Farmers Market, (Alternate Saturdays), Woodbridge, Suffolk
  • Snape Maltings Farmers Market, (Monthly), Snape, Suffolk
Next

Say Hello.

Please direct all enquires to Jenny Madden –

  • 07718 701886
  • jenny@ladywhincups.com

If you are in Suffolk please stop by to see what fresh blooms we have, we welcome all enquiries / visitors.
